task.title: Configuring LTPA profiles by using the
task.shortdesc: System administrators can configure LTPA profiles by using the Security Settings page in the .

context.p: You can configure LTPA profiles by using the , or by using . For more information about using to configure LTPA profiles, see .
For more information about the components that you must specify when you configure LTPA profiles, see .

step.cmd: Go to the Security Settings page in one of the following ways:

choices.choice: From the Home tab, click Server Security in the Secure your environment pane.
From the Server menu, click Security Settings.

step.cmd: Choose an action from the LTPA Profiles pane:

choices.choice: To add an LTPA profile, click the Add icon.

To delete an LTPA profile, select the profile and click the Delete icon.You cannot delete an LTPA profile that is associated with a security profile. First, remove the LTPA profile from the associated security profile, and then delete the LTPA profile.
To edit an LTPA profile, select the profile and click the Edit icon.
